How it's made

The latest development in the field of ecology and water
Cup with a lock pushes up by pressing the button
Silicon gasket and lock prevent water from spilling
Tritan body
Durable, transparent and environmentally friendly material. Used in the production of children`s tableware. BBPA, BSP, EA free
Colored sleeve
Plesant to touch silicone sleeve for slip protection & aesthetic allure
MINERAL FILTER
16 natural components enrich and purify water

The human body is more than 60% composed of water

all life-forming liquids of the organism determines water composition, which we drink
